entry.title: $1925 // Prime location, renovated 1 bedroom apartment
entry.content:

Amazing kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a microwave, and granite countertops.
The modern, granite kitchen bar
The living room area is very spacious
There are large windows that provide natural light throughout.
The bedroom fits a queen size bed plus furniture and comes with closet space.
The apartment is centrally located close to dining, transportation, shopping and fitness centers/gyms.
very close to 2,3,4,5 and A, C trains
